title: Bullying the Heroine Is Too Tedious, So I Will Become a Commoner, Like in the Game - Novel Updates
tags: Average-looking Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Otome Game   Reincarnation   Villainess Noble Girls
author: せららん
description:
Reincarnating as a villainess and having to pass all your days busy, bullying the heroine, it's too troublesome!

The fiancée of the prince, will be abandoned and lose her title, according to the game route ending. Ok, I give up! Please have a happy ending with Cedric!

I was thinking in that way, but before I notice it, the prince put me under house arrest ... eh, why?

Since she abandoned her role as the villain, everybody felt pity for her.

And the fiancé who always tried to avoid the villainess before, now is coming to visit me! What do you mean?!!
Shouldn't he be living his happily ever after with the heroine??!


A villainess who threw away her role but wants to proceed according to the game original plot, and a prince who is more villainous than her, this is their story.>
